title: Groom wearing dark tuxedo with tails, light colored vest, button down collared shirt, and bow tie and bride wearing light colored dress with pleated skirt, ruched bodice, sheer ruffled sleeves, and decorative objects between right sleeve and bodice and headband with veil, holding flowers and book, standing behind three tiered wedding cake with leaf decoration on table with light colored lace tablecloth, in interior with floral wallpaper and window with dark geometric patterned and light colored lace curtains
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
